001package com.telos.loops.events;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnoreProperties;
004import com.telos.loops.error.LoopsValidationException;
005import jakarta.annotation.Nonnull;
006import java.util.Map;
007
008/**
009 * Request to send an event to Loops.
010 *
011 * <p>
012 * Events are used to trigger automated email sequences or track user behavior.
013 * You must provide
014 * an event name and either an email or userId to identify the contact.
015 * Event-specific data can be
016 * included via eventProperties, and contact properties can be updated via
017 * additionalProperties.
018 *
019 * <p>
020 * Example usage:
021 *
022 * <pre>{@code
023 * EventSendRequest request = new EventSendRequest(
024 *     "user@example.com", // email
025 *     null, // userId
026 *     "purchase_completed", // eventName (required)
027 *     Map.of("amount", 99.99, // eventProperties
028 *         "productId", "prod-123"),
029 *     null, // mailingLists
030 *     Map.of("lastPurchase", "2024-01-15") // additionalProperties
031 * );
032 * }</pre>
033 *
034 * @param email                the email address of the contact associated with
035 *                             this event
036 * @param userId               your application's unique identifier for the
037 *                             contact
038 * @param eventName            the name of the event (required, must match an
039 *                             event configured in Loops)
040 * @param eventProperties      event-specific properties (e.g., purchase amount,
041 *                             product ID)
042 * @param mailingLists         map of mailing list IDs to subscription status to
043 *                             update for this contact
044 * @param additionalProperties contact properties to update when this event is
045 *                             sent
046 */
047@JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = false)
048public record EventSendRequest(
049    String email,
050    String userId,
051    @Nonnull String eventName,
052    Map<String, Object> eventProperties,
053    Map<String, Boolean> mailingLists,
054    Map<String, Object> additionalProperties) {
055
056  /**
057   * Compact constructor with validation.
058   *
059   * @throws LoopsValidationException if eventName is null or blank
060   */
061  public EventSendRequest {
062    if (eventName == null || eventName.isBlank()) {
063      throw new LoopsValidationException("eventName is required and cannot be blank");
064    }
065  }
066}
